document_title: Gestational hypertension: Symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: tang-huyet-ap-thai-ky.json_2_Recognize symptoms of high blood pressure during pregnancy
subsection_content:
According to MSc. Dinh Thi Hien Le, depending on each pregnant woman's condition, the disease may have different symptoms, however there are cases where pregnant women do not have any signs. Usually signs of high blood pressure in pregnant women appear in the second half of pregnancy including:
Swollen feet and hands;; Sudden weight gain;; Vision disorders (blurred vision, double vision, transient vision loss,...);; Nausea, vomiting;; Severe headache, epigastric pain, chest pain behind the sternum and difficulty breathing.
subsection_title: tang huyet ap thai ky.json. Recognize symptoms of high blood pressure during pregnancy
subsection_data:
tang huyet ap thai ky.json. Recognize symptoms of high blood pressure during pregnancy
According to MSc. Dinh Thi Hien Le, depending on each pregnant woman's condition, the disease may have different symptoms, however there are cases where pregnant women do not have any signs. Usually signs of high blood pressure in pregnant women appear in the second half of pregnancy including:
Swollen feet and hands;; Sudden weight gain;; Vision disorders (blurred vision, double vision, transient vision loss,...);; Nausea, vomiting;; Severe headache, epigastric pain, chest pain behind the sternum and difficulty breathing.
